title: SF says security forces planning to attack Temple Trees protestors
body_lines: Credible reports are surfacing that the security forces are planning to launch an attack on the unarmed protesters who have gathered in front of the Temple Trees peacefully and moves are underway to eject the protesters forcibly from the site, SJB MP Field Marshal Sarath Fonseka charged.
He urged the people to join, line up to oppose the suppression on people's sovereignty using the iron fist.
